DescriptionData.Title: Alan Sloane Solid Colored Tights
DescriptionData.Description: Our blue tights will add a vivid splash of color to your performances. These heavier weight tights are available in an assortment of bright, clear colors that will make any outfit shine. Made from 100% nylon, Medium size fits approximately 5'4" - 5'7".
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Heavy-weight, 100% Nylon dance tights are recommended for slim legs, will not fit large or hefty legs
Extra large tights fit approximately 5'11"-6'1", 160-220 lbs
